modules.name: Content Quality
modules.description: Evaluates depth, accuracy, and comprehensiveness of content
insights: Content demonstrates strong expertise with detailed technical explanations
Most pages exceed 1,500 words with substantive information
Some pages lack recent updates (last modified >12 months ago)

issues.message: 15 pages have not been updated in over 12 months
Some product pages lack detailed specifications

recommendations.title: Update stale content
recommendations.description: Refresh outdated pages with current information and recent data
actionItems: Review and update 15 pages last modified >12 months ago
Add 2024 statistics and case studies where applicable
Update product specifications with latest versions
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 8-12 point increase in Content Quality score

recommendations.title: Enhance product page depth
recommendations.description: Add comprehensive specifications and use cases to product pages
actionItems: Add detailed technical specifications to 8 product pages
Include comparison tables with competitors
Add customer testimonials and case studies
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 5-7 point increase in Content Quality score

modules.name: E-E-A-T Signals
modules.description: Expertise, Experience, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness indicators
insights: Author bylines present on 60% of content pages
Company credentials and certifications are well-documented
Author expertise profiles need enhancement with more detailed backgrounds

issues.message: 40% of content pages lack author attribution
Author bio pages are minimal and lack credentials

recommendations.title: Add author attribution to all content
recommendations.description: Ensure every content page has a clear author byline with link to author profile
actionItems: Add author bylines to 42 pages currently missing attribution
Create author profile pages for all content creators
Link author profiles from every content page
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 10-15 point increase in E-E-A-T score

recommendations.title: Enhance author profiles
recommendations.description: Expand author bio pages with credentials, experience, and expertise
actionItems: Add detailed professional backgrounds to 12 author profiles
Include relevant certifications and qualifications
Add links to external professional profiles (LinkedIn, publications)
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 5-8 point increase in E-E-A-T score

modules.name: Technical SEO
modules.description: Site structure, crawlability, and technical optimization
insights: XML sitemap is well-structured and up-to-date
Core Web Vitals scores are above industry benchmarks
Mobile responsiveness is excellent across all pages

issues.message: Some images lack alt text attributes

recommendations.title: Add missing alt text
recommendations.description: Ensure all images have descriptive alt text for accessibility and SEO
actionItems: Audit all images across the site
Add descriptive alt text to images missing attributes
Ensure alt text is contextually relevant and not keyword-stuffed
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 2-3 point increase in Technical SEO score

modules.name: AI Readability
modules.description: How well content is structured for AI understanding and extraction
insights: Structured data (JSON-LD) is implemented on key pages
Content uses clear headings and semantic HTML
Some pages lack schema.org markup for products and services

issues.message: Product pages missing Product schema markup
FAQ schema not implemented on support pages

recommendations.title: Implement Product schema markup
recommendations.description: Add JSON-LD Product schema to all product pages for better AI understanding
actionItems: Add Product schema to 18 product pages
Include price, availability, ratings, and reviews in schema
Validate schema using Google's Rich Results Test
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 8-12 point increase in AI Readability score

recommendations.title: Add FAQ schema to support pages
recommendations.description: Implement FAQPage schema markup on support and help pages
actionItems: Identify 6 support pages with FAQ content
Add FAQPage schema with questions and answers
Ensure FAQ content is visible on page, not hidden
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 4-6 point increase in AI Readability score

modules.name: Link Profile
modules.description: Quality and relevance of inbound and internal links
insights: Strong internal linking structure with contextual anchor text
Limited high-authority external backlinks from relevant domains
Some orphaned pages lack internal links

issues.message: 12 pages have no internal inbound links
Low number of backlinks from authoritative domains

recommendations.title: Fix orphaned pages
recommendations.description: Add internal links to 12 pages that are currently not linked from anywhere
actionItems: Identify relevant pages to link to orphaned content
Add contextual internal links with descriptive anchor text
Update sitemap to ensure all pages are discoverable
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 6-10 point increase in Link Profile score

recommendations.title: Build authoritative backlinks
recommendations.description: Develop content and outreach strategy to earn backlinks from high-authority domains
actionItems: Create linkable assets (research, guides, tools)
Identify target domains in your industry
Develop outreach campaign for guest posts and resource pages
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 5-8 point increase in Link Profile score over 3-6 months

modules.name: User Intent Alignment
modules.description: How well content matches search intent and user queries
insights: Most pages align well with informational and transactional intent
Some pages target keywords with mismatched intent
Content depth matches user expectations for most queries

issues.message: 8 pages target keywords with intent mismatch

recommendations.title: Realign content with search intent
recommendations.description: Review and update pages with intent mismatches to better match user expectations
actionItems: Audit 8 pages with intent mismatches
Update content to match primary search intent (informational vs transactional)
Add or adjust CTAs based on intent type
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 5-7 point increase in User Intent Alignment score

modules.name: Brand Signals
modules.description: Brand mentions, citations, and online presence indicators
insights: Brand name appears consistently across content
Limited brand mentions in external publications and directories
Social media presence is active but could be more integrated

issues.message: Inconsistent NAP (Name, Address, Phone) information across directories
Low brand mention volume in industry publications

recommendations.title: Standardize NAP information
recommendations.description: Ensure consistent Name, Address, Phone information across all business directories
actionItems: Audit all business directory listings
Update inconsistent NAP information
Claim and verify listings on major directories (Google Business, Yelp, etc.)
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 8-12 point increase in Brand Signals score

recommendations.title: Increase brand mentions
recommendations.description: Develop PR and content strategy to increase brand mentions in industry publications
actionItems: Pitch thought leadership content to industry publications
Participate in industry events and webinars
Develop relationships with journalists and bloggers in your space
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 5-8 point increase in Brand Signals score over 6-12 months
